DamRsn/NeuralNote

Audio plugin for converting audio to MIDI using deep learning

Related repos

  • Lightweight audio to MIDI conversion with a neural network
  • Separates vocals from audio files using neural networks
  • Music generation toolkit using AI
  • AudioCraft: code for generating music, sound effects, and audio compression from raw audio and textinputs
  • real-time high quality audio-driven lip-syncing for video dubbing
  • DeepClaude: Combines DeepSeek R1 and Claude 3.5 for AI reasoning and coding
  • speech interface tools for audio comprehension and generation
  • Runs AI models for audio processing locally on hardware
  • Converts audio to images and back
  • Text-to-speech engine for long-form audio
